newsitem.title: CANADA: WIC resolution to dissolve co defeated.
newsitem.headline: WIC resolution to dissolve co defeated.

text.p: A motion to dissolve WIC Western International Communications Ltd was defeated on Wednesday by its Class A shareholders but Class B shareholders registered a strong protest over management of the broadcaster.
At the company's annual meeting New York investment firm Oppenheimer & Co tabled two motions, including one for the company to be liquidated.
The second motion required two-thirds of both Class A and Class B shareholders to vote in favor.
